frame.name: Remembering_to_do
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> thinks of and performs an <fen>Action</fen> that is a self- or other-imposed task or some other kind of desirable behavior. The <fen>Action</fen> may involve a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> in some way affected by the <fen>Cognizer</fen>. If a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is mentioned, the <fen>Action</fen> is left unexpressed.
<ex>You invited everybody but you <t>forgot</t> <fex name="sal">Harry</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Thank God <fex name="cog">Smithers</fex> <t>remembered</t> <fex name="act">to return the video.</fex>.</ex>
<ex>If you <t>forget</t> <fex name="sal">your textbook</fex> and there is an assignment to be done, the highest grade you will receive on the work is aC (70%).</ex>
<ex>Did <fex name="cog">you</fex> <t>remember</t> <fex name="sal">about the letter</fex>?</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person who thinks of or fails to think of an obligatory or desireable <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex>.<fex name="cog">Alex and Zach Swindle</fex>, Centre, visited their brother in San Francisco in June and <t>remembered</t> to take along a copy of The Post>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Action</fen> that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is supposed to carry out. This may be a Task imposed specifically on the <fen>Cognizer</fen> or it may be self- or socially imposed.
<ex>This time we <t>remembered</t> <fex name="act">to turn the gas off before leaving</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Salient_entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is a person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> needs to affect or effect when carrying out the <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex>We piled into the taxi and right when we were about to leave, I realized we <t>forgot</t> <fex name="sal">the video camera</fex></ex></def-root>
